p: The title compound was prepared from N-{3-[3-(2-chloro-4-pyrimidinyl)pyrazolo[1,5-a]pyridin-2-yl]phenyl}-2,6-difluorobenzamide and 3-fluoro-4-({[(2S)-1-methyl-2-pyrrolidinyl]methyl}oxy)aniline in a manner analogous to Example 27, Step D. HRMS calcd for C 36H 30F 3N 7O 2: 649.2413; found: 650.2491 (M+H +).
